file_content.text: The Heralds had a head start. Be ready for anything. We could be stepping out into a minor war.
Or a trap. Or Koth's entrails on display.
Not that I'm hoping.
I know. You didn't get the deal you wanted. But you did get the deal you deserved.
Think of it this way, Exalted...
...you'll finally be with your great serpent.
I'm curious, Outlander--what would you do with the Exalted's son?
There is nothing to stop you from becoming the new Exalted now. I expect you to honor your end of our agreement.
You've done everything I asked. The Heralds won't get in your way, I swear it.
Then leave.
Probably not the condition you wanted to find me in.
Good to have you back, Koth.
Glad you're okay.
How did the Lady capture you?
She was worried sick about you.
[Lie] Senya was concerned.
What?
I believe it.
The Lady knows all about the Gravestone, what we're using it for. I told her that much. But she already knew a lot about you.
You're the Lady of Sorrows? A droid?
You shouldn't have--
I am no droid, Battlemaster. I am an intelligence beyond comprehension. You may call me SCORPIO.
Continue operations in my stead. Annihilate the Heralds if you must. I will remain in touch.
She's coming with us? Just like that?
Watch this one. She's a bigger threat than Senya any day.
Not exactly what I expected, but close. Shall we depart?
Hang on. What's that supposed to mean?
What you expected?
If you can do what you say, you'll be quite an asset.
Glad you're assisting us.
Don't try anything. If you step out of line even once....
I'll be watching you.
Your suspicion is unimpressive.
Why are you agreeing to help?
I wish to speak to the Gravestone. I look forward to communicating with an intellect that rivals my own for a change.
What about Arcann?
He has something of mine. The severity of his error must be recognized.
I know a thing or two about war.
SCORPIO. You're the Lady of Sorrows.
Commander. I had suspected you were this particular "Outlander", but was unable to confirm it until today.
I'm curious--what would you do with the Exalted's son?
You got what you wanted. Let him pursue his life as he sees fit.
I'd let him be free.
Not unreasonable, but my full intent has yet to be achieved.
If he was in charge of the Heralds, he'd fear and respect you, unlike his father.
Have him lead the Heralds.
For his sake, he had better.
He could be his father's son, could want revenge for his death. It would be a risk to let him live.
I'd kill him.
Do you hold any animosity toward me?
For what?
Thanks.
How did SCORPIO capture you?
How did you end up here?
She got the drop on me while I was minding the Heralds. Gave me a jolt. Woke up here and she explained who she is.
I told your friend here what we're doing with the Gravestone. I think she's on board, but I also think she might be more dangerous than Senya.
Never had anyone sneak up on me like that. I'm lucky she didn't want me dead.
I'm glad you're all right, Senya.
That makes two of us.
Thanks.
That you are. If SCORPIO did want you dead, she wouldn't have thought twice.
Lucky is right.
Some company you used to keep.
She doesn't seem to have a problem with killing.
It would appear so....
No, she does not.
No one was more concerned for your well-being than Koth.
[Lie] That makes three of us.
I'm sure.
Since we need her help and she had me at a sizable disadvantage, I told her about the Gravestone. Sounds like she wants to join us.
Do we trust her?
SCORPIO's motives will be mine to contend with.
I can work with her.
As long as our agendas are aligned, she'll make an invaluable asset.
For now.
She has her own agenda. It's imperative we keep that in mind.
No.
I trust your long sleep was restful?
Very. I don't suppose you've heard from Kaliyo, Vector, anyone?
Once you were gone, I no longer needed to remain among your crew. It should come as no surprise.
I've improved a great deal. This self-iteration is number one-zero-eight-four. My evolutionary potential grows with each passing day.
Is that why you remained in Wild Space? Better potentiality?
Why Zakuul?
The technology here is beyond anything in Megasecurity Ward 23, or any world I've visited with you.
Congratulations. I always knew you would reach new heights.
That's great.
I have Zakuulan technological advances and the freedom to pursue my heuristic directive to thank for that.
No sudden moves until I know where we stand.
Stay back.
As you no longer have any hold over me, I don't consider you a threat to my continued advancement. Your concern is unnecessary.
Since we need her help and she had me at a sizable disadvantage, I told her about the Gravestone. But you I didn't have to tell her about.
No, don't call her--
I am no droid, Barsen'thor. I am an intelligence beyond comprehension. You may call me SCORPIO.
I am no droid, Major. I am an intelligence beyond comprehension. You may call me SCORPIO.
I am no droid, Captain. I am an intelligence beyond comprehension. You may call me SCORPIO.
I am no droid, Wrath. I am an intelligence beyond comprehension. You may call me SCORPIO.
I am no droid, Dark Lord. I am an intelligence beyond comprehension. You may call me SCORPIO.
I am no droid, Grand Champion. I am an intelligence beyond comprehension. You may call me SCORPIO.
I've come to Zakuul to further my heuristic directive of self-improvement. This self-iteration is number one-zero-eight-four.
The proposal put forth by your colleague intrigues me enough that I've decided to accompany you.
Is that right?
So you are coming with us?
Naturally.
Guess you convinced her.
Don't think I had to. She's... unlike any machine I've ever come across.
Hold on. What did you expect?
What does that mean?
Only a slight deviation from expectations. There is no cause for concern.
I do not engage in hyperbole. I've never found a need to.
What did he take?
Just asking....
Codename: Gemini. Continue our investigation.
Yes, my lady.
Very well.
My exact calculation. Excellent.
Cautious. Unfettered by morality. Interesting.
Of course. I can finally lead the Heralds to the glorious future we deserve--you will have your just rewards.
Eternal Fleet units five-two-two, eight-six-five, and nine-eight-three will prepare for deployment. Combat protocols fully engaged.
All ships--confirm new deployment.
The Outlander will not escape us this time.
All GEMINI command units confirm. Preparations are already underway....
